channel.title: vs code on Yak Shaving
channel.description: Recent content in vs code on Yak Shaving

item.title: Open Visual Studio Code From Terminal
item.description: There will be occasions when you need to open your favorite IDE visual studio from terminal, a common scenario could be to open a generated file while you are still in terminal, without switching the context.

item.title: Wrap html tag in vs studio
item.description: Rather than every time you need to wrap an element or a group of elements, you create the element, cut and paste the inner tags, you may make use of a Wrap with Abbreviation a handy time-saver native feature of visual studio code
